.  The district consists of the Western half of the northern arm of Halmahera Island plus North Loloda sub-district around the Northern cape and

Island up to the Northeast. 

The area is sprinkled with beautiful white and black sand beaches which are accessible both by road and boat. Off the coast of North Halamahera there are also numerous small islands, both inhabited and uninhabited, with a lot of excellent snorkeling and swimming.
